page.title: 06WOODINGDEAN PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Chase Game"44 save all". More than three people are needed.Someone is chosen to be "It".He covers his eyes and counts to 44.Everyone else hides."It"looks for them.When he sees someone he shouts "44 see you!"and touches a post.The first person caught is "It"for the next game unless the last person can touch the post and save him. Skipping Game. This rhyme is said by girls whilst skipping with a rope. "Cowboy Joe from Mexico, Says,Hands up, stich 'em up, Drop your guns and pick 'em up. O.U.T.spells out."
